TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content:
i'm very sorry to say this blackheart but you might need to go back and look at that front gear again...

i played with it and tried very hard to get it off the ground but it flipped over continously... then i replaced the front gear with a scaled down version of the stock landing gear... works perfectly. flys like a dream and i even got it into space with not much damage (i nicked an engine off but repaired it on my space station)

sorry again black heart but that front landing gear either has to get fixed or get removed great animations tho. i gotta admit that.
Hmm any news on an IVA?

The landing gear is actually Daemoria's model and Nazari's importing skills, I take no credit for it. Even the animation and config. I luckily had the model kept in my PC so we were able to continue the development of this. It's too bad I am not that good at developing fully on a mod that I didn't start so please accept my apology if I work slow.

The landing gear is actually Daemoria's model and Nazari's importing skills, I take no credit for it. Even the animation and config. I luckily had the model kept in my PC so we were able to continue the development of this. It's too bad I am not that good at developing fully on a mod that I didn't start so please accept my apology if I work slow.

meh the way your cranking out mods i don't blame you for working slow.
I love the this mod . I would use it malot more if got fixed. Maybe dealy re-entry integration, since you got such a nice looking heatshield.
The docking port also needs some luvin'. Doesn't seem to work correctly in 0.25. The back is the front sorta.
Try downloading the latest version and I think I have the fix for the not attaching somewhere
To me the issue is that the ship flys perpendicular with the ground.

Try downloading the latest version and I think I have the fix for the not attaching somewhere

DLed latest version...docking port still not working.

Did you download this fix?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71095-Pteron-Micro-Shuttle-and-rescue-vehicle-Beta-download-available%289-9-2014%29?p=1452662&viewfull=1#post1452662

the landing gear is broken http://i.imgur.com/kMCmWYs.png thats what i mean

Edited November 12, 2014 by Kerbostar

the landing gear is broken.file:///C:/Program%20Files%20(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/Screenshots/screenshot24.png thats what i mean

Hi.

You've linked to an image that is still on your own computer. You will need to upload it to an image-host or web host somewhere so that people can see it. IMGUR is the popular one.

Edited November 12, 2014 by technicalfool

http://imgur.com/kMCmWYs there you go

vid showing the problem. Edited November 12, 2014 by tetryds
Merged to avoid double posting.
is threre a fix for the landing gear problem?

should the wing config be like this.


PART{
// this is a sample config file, for determining a good file format for defining part parameters
// comment line - ignored by cfg parser
// empty lines, or lines without a '=' sign are also ignored
// all other lines are split at the '=' sign, and the left operand is used to know what parameter we are setting
// diferent parameters require data in different formats (see docs), and each module has it's own parameters (again, see docs)
// each assignment must be in a single line. Lines without assignments will be ignored. (You CAN turn on word wrap, though)
// each keyword here relates to an existing variable in the assigned module. If the keyword isn't found, it is ignored.
// conversely, if a keyword is left unassigned (as in not in the file), it will be initialized with it's default value
// This is done automatically, so any public variable defined in the loaded module can be accessed this way (provided it's value can be parsed)




// --- general parameters ---
name = pteronwingleft
module = Winglet
author = Sage Sagan,Daemoria,Nazari,blackheart612


// --- asset parameters ---
MODEL
{
	model = Pteron/Parts/pteronwingleft
}
scale = 1
rescaleFactor = 1


// --- editor parameters ---
TechRequired = supersonicFlight
entryCost = 4900
cost = 450
category = Aero
subcategory = 0
title =  Pteron Winglet L
manufacturer = Fruit Bat Industries
description = Winglet, non-symmetrical use may result in death




// attachment rules: stack, srfAttach, allowStack, allowSrfAttach, allowCollision
attachRules = 1,0,0,1,1


// --- node definitions ---
// definition format is Position X, Position Y, Position Z, Up X, Up Y, Up Z


node_stack_top = 0.4414, 0.0, 0.3159, 0, 0, 1, 2




// --- standard part parameters ---
mass = 0.09
dragModelType = override
maximum_drag = 0.02
minimum_drag = 0.02
angularDrag = 2
maxTemp = 3600 


crashTolerance = 200
breakingForce = 150
breakingTorque = 250


explosionPotential = 0.1
fuelCrossFeed = True
// --- winglet parameters ---
// dragCoeff will override the maximum_drag value
dragCoeff = 0.3
deflectionLiftCoeff = 1.0


MODULE
{
	name = ModuleControlSurface
	dragCoeff = 0.5
	deflectionLiftCoeff = 0.5
	ctrlSurfaceRange = 20
	ctrlSurfaceArea = 0.78
}


MODULE
{
	name = FARWingAerodynamicModel
	MAC = 2.264
	e = 0.75
	MidChordSweep = 22.16
	b_2 = 3.601
	TaperRatio = 0.188
}


// --- tweakables (coming soon...) ---




MODULE
{
	name = FSwheel
	wheelColliderName = wheelCollider
	boundsCollider = Bounds
	wheelMeshName = Wheel
	suspensionParentName = suspensionParent
	rotationAdjustment = 2.0 // adjust the visual rotation speed of the wheel meshes if they are off
	numberOfWheels = 1
	animationName = pteronleft
	disableColliderWhenRetracted = True
	hasMotor = False
	motorEnabled = False // set to false for landing gears to start unpowered.
	motorTorque = 3.75
	maxSpeed = 35 // the motorTorque is 1 at 0 speed, and 0 at this speed, meaning the actual max speed is probably way lower.
	overrideModelFrictionValues = True // MUST be on for any of the friction values to take effect, otherwise it uses the values in the models wheelCollider
	forwardsStiffness = 3.0 // Forwards friction (Unity default is 1.0, which is not enough to get up small hills)
	resourceConsumptionRate = 0.2
	resourceName = ElectricCharge
	//motorStartsReversed = True
	brakeTorque = 15
	brakeSpeed = 0.75
	animationLayer = 2
	deployedDrag = 0.35
	retractedDrag = 0.0
	guiActiveUnfocused = True
	unfocusedRange = 5.0
	//brakeEmissiveObjectName = noselight
	//onEmissiveColor = 1, 0.2, 0.2
	//offEmissiveColor = 0, 0, 0
	//deployingEmissiveColor = 0.2, 1, 0.2
	//disabledEmissiveColor = 0, 0, 0
}






MODULE
{
	name = FSpartTurner
	//steerMultiplier = 12
	targetPartObject = Steering
	rotationDirectionX = 0
	rotationDirectionY = 0
	rotationDirectionZ = 1
	defaultRotationX = 0
	defaultRotationY = 0
	defaultRotationZ = 0
	steeringEnabled = True	
	reversedInput = False
	steerMultiplier = 0	// in degrees
	steerMaxSpeed = 16	// speed where steering is lowest
	speedAdjustedSteering = True	
	speedAdjustedSteeringMinimumMultiplier = 0.05  // at top speed, steering is this number, 1 is full power
}


    MODULE
    {
        name = ModuleRCS
        thrusterTransformName = RCSthruster
        thrusterPower = 0.58
        resourceName = MonoPropellant
        atmosphereCurve
        {
            key = 0 275
            key = 1 125
        }
    }
// ----- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS POINT ------


}

i am currently working on a stock version. Dang, that thing is hard to live up to in stock! i am trying my best though. Pics soon!
I have a bit suggestion, Coould you improve the lift rating of the wings?
Just poking back in here a little late. Glad to see development resuming, hope to see a great release soonÃ¢â€žÂ¢.
any news about updating?

It would be absolutely AWESOME if you could add an IVA with RasterPropMonitor support and high-res textures!

Edited March 22, 2015 by SpaceLaunchSystem

I look at this and am simultaneously horrified, amused, and impressed.

I love the concept and intended use, but visually I cannot shake the image of the http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/McDonnell_XF-85_Goblin
I love the concept and the originality! Just one thing: where's the OMS? In the concept drawing, you have an engine mounted in the wings. Did I use the wrong download? I can't seem to find an OMS.
The only thing that the Goblin lacks to give it style and make it .... looking is the " Kerbal Space Program" logo.
There are a lot of aerospace ideas that are straight up kerbal, Project Pluto, Project Orion, full sized hypergolic fueled rockets, the Northrop Flying Ram, the list goes on, but you get the idea

I love the concept and the originality! Just one thing: where's the OMS? In the concept drawing, you have an engine mounted in the wings. Did I use the wrong download? I can't seem to find an OMS.

The OMS's used in this craft are the stock MonoPropellant engines.
